name: Teeth Whitening
description: A cosmetic dental procedure that lightens the color of teeth and helps to remove stains and discoloration.

name: Root Canal Treatment
description: A dental procedure used to treat infection at the center of a tooth. It involves removing the infected pulp and sealing the tooth.

name: Dental Implants
description: A surgical procedure that involves placing a metal post in the jawbone to serve as a replacement root for a missing tooth.

name: Orthodontics
description: A branch of dentistry that deals with the diagnosis, prevention, and correction of misaligned teeth and jaws.

name: Cosmetic Dentistry
description: Dental work that improves the appearance of teeth, gums, and smile, including procedures like veneers and bonding.
